short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dlvr.it makes sharing great content easy. Share content to Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and more from anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dlvr.it makes it easy to share updates across social media. Post breaking news, photos and videos to Facebook, Twitter, and across all your social media platforms.
